FuncDef:
The vxlan anycast-gateway enable command enables distributed gateway.
The undo vxlan anycast-gateway enable command disables distributed gateway. The vxlan anycast-gateway enable command enables distributed gateway. The undo vxlan anycast-gateway enable command disables distributed gateway. By default, distributed gateway is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ExtraInfo:
To enable distributed gateway on a VBDIF interface and allow the gateway to learn only user-side ARP, ND, or DHCP packets, run the
vxlan anycast-gateway enable command. After distributed gateway is enabled, the gateway:
